AI Description: CUDA is a parallel computing platform and application programming interface model created by NVIDIA. It allows software developers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit for general-purpose processing.
Core Features: Parallel Computing Platform, Programming Model For Nvidia Gpus, Support For C, C++, & Fortran Programming Languages, Unified Memory For Simplified Memory Management, Performance Optimization Tools
General Tags: Parallel Computing, Gpu Programming, High Performance Computing, Software Development
